QuestData.Title: Razorscale Must Die!
QuestData.Description: Razorscale normally keeps to her aerie near the Colossal Forge in Ulduar. Of late, however, she has been spotted raining fire down upon lands outside of the titan complex.$B$BThough the broodmother's is a sad tale, she poses an imminent threat to all of Northrend. The Council of Six has decreed that Razorscale must die!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Razorscale.$B$BThis quest can be completed with any difficulty or size raid.
QuestData.RewardText: Now Veranus can finally rest in peace.
